items.title: US Senate Republicans struggle to push Trump's budget bill over finish line
items.description: As it stands, Republicans in the Senate are yet to convince key holdouts to support Trump's One Big Beautiful Bill Act.

items.title: Spain and Portugal record hottest June ever as heatwave grips Europe
items.description: A number of European regions recorded their highest temperatures on the final day of June.

items.title: Guilty plea expected in 2022 murders of four Idaho students
items.description: Relatives of one victim posted on Facebook that the state had failed them by allowing a plea deal.

items.title: Three killed in Ukrainian drone attack on central Russia
items.description: The attack on a factory in the city of Izhevsk was more than 1,000km (620 miles) from the border.

items.title: Trump tightens US policy on Cuba
items.description: President Trump says a statutory ban on tourism to Cuba will be enforced more strictly.
